body.name: Ermnois Ergonomic Home Office Chair, High Back Desk Chair with Adjustable Lumbar Support, 2D Armrest and Headrest, Black Mesh Computer Gaming Chair with Tilt Function
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 8 hrs 9 mins
features: 【Ergonomic Office Chair】This home office desk chair has an adjustable backrest and armrests. You can adjust the backrest to perfectly fit your spine and help ease the fatigue and pain of your lumbar and back. The seat cushion is made of high density foam for a comfortable sitting experience. All these ergonomic designs help you feel all-day comfort with 8~12 hours of working. Weight capacity: 300lbs.

【Breathable and Durable】 This mesh office chair is breathable and durable thanks to its various high quality materials. The mesh back and soft upgraded seat is breathable enough for your skin to breathe. You will have a feeling of sitting in the air. The durable metal base is sturdy and safe to use for a long time. The mute nylon casters do not make noise and are friendly to your floor and carpets.

【Adjustable Features】The seat of this computer chair can be smoothly adjusted from to due to its SGS certified gas lift. The height of the breathable headrest can be adjusted from 6.30”~8.66”, and the angle of it can be adjusted from 60°~120°. The height of the soft armrests and be adjusted from 9.45”~12.20”. The backrest can be adjusted 1.4” backward and forward. All these make this chair perfect for different heights and different sitting gestures.

【Multiple Function】 This swivel black office chair can be easily put under the desk to save more space when you lower the armrests. The soft headrest and tilt function offer a place to have a nap. This home office chair is suitable for various occasions, like the workplace, home office, study room, or gaming room.

【Easy Assemble and Garanteed】It comes with instructions and assembly tools and is easy to assemble under the instructions. We also provide videos for this assemble of this ergonomic executive chair. The durable high-back office chair can help relieve your working hours. Customer satisfaction is also guaranteed. Please feel free to get in touch with us if there are any questions, and we will provide the best customer service for you. Get this ergonomic office chair to have an easier life!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent office chair
reviews.reviewText: Sat on this for 2 weeks to get a good feel on how comfortable it is. Overall an excellent office chair - the seat cushion is thick and I could sit on it for hours, it tilts back and the head rest is great when leaning back... adjusts for different heights (caters to tall people too, or you could just take it off if you're shorter). The armrests are also adjustable, although I do wish they were positioned a bit more towards the back as I found my elbows hanging off them a bit. The one thing I couldn't test was the lumbar support as the knob on the back fell off during assembly, and the position of my backrest does not provide any. Nothing a back cushion can't fix. Customer support offered to send me a new chair but I decided to just keep this one to avoid the hassle. Assembly was easy and I assembled it myself in 20 minutes with the included instructions, no extra tools required. The chair is heavy, sturdy and was packaged well. Overall, I would recommend this chair to people looking for a reliable affordable and comfortable office chair. Sidenote: the tilt function is adjusted by turning the knob under the chair (this wasn't on the instruction manual).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great chair. Outstanding value
reviews.reviewText: This chair was the best quality I could find among same priced products. It's easier to assemble, and comfortable. Worth the money 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super bang for your buck!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this chair for my wife and it is very comfortable and helps you to have 90 degree angles on legs and arms plus the back support is really good, is sturdy. I put my own weight on it(not trying to break it just my own weight) and the back did not give unless using the little lever. My own chair is more expensive and the back does not hold my weight, it gives easily. If I could buy this for me, I would. But im 6’1 and 360lbs so is not gonna last with me.Ps: the headrest on top is really neat. I thought that was not necessary since Im a gamer and we never have are back fully on the back of the chair.. but if you use it properly, you’re gonna love the headrest

reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together and it’s really comfortable. Happy with my purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great chair, great value
reviews.reviewText: I was very surprised at the quality of this chair! It really easy to put together, my wife was able to do ut it all on her own. The back support is nice and tall and the neck piece is adjustable. The best part is the price! Chairs this quality are about double the price. 100% recommended!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks sturdy, confortable on 1st sight, and experienced a 5*
reviews.reviewText: Update after using the replacement chair for several months.I confirm it is a good chair, very flexible and adjustable, I am very happy with it. The replacement was send very quickly (at no charge ) after I returned the 1st one ( no charge) that was damaged.1sr review:It looks very nice, study and it is well packaged. It is also comfortable with several adjustments possible. I still have some doubts with the quality and how it will age because i have had several problems.The first chair I ordered had the lumbar support broken so I returned it and I got the 2nd one very quickly after initiating the 1st one return. Good.The assembly of the second one was not as easy: the documentation is missing step 6 ( no page missing, just jumping from step 5 to 6), one of the screw was bad (it looked different and was not working) but there are spares so it worked well in the end.There is no information about how to allow for tilt: It does not at first, one has to pull the height adjustment lever out to allow it.I saw this on the video for another brand!!!All in all it seems ok but all these incidents give me some doubts… I prefer to wait a little before giving it a 5*

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value for the quality and price
reviews.reviewText: So i was in the market for a new chair after the arm rest on a cheaper model i bought on Amazon broke.I saw there was a sale and coupon for this model so i placed an order.When i got the chair it came with everything needed to assemble it out of the box. However, if you have a power drill with screw bits it'll definitely help with the build, as there is a lot of screwing (get you head out of the gutter).Any who, after setting it up the chair it self felt pretty sturdy and comfortable. I've had it for a while now and so far it's held up pretty good.Would definitely recommend.
